TextView.android:text: 2 Muscle Ups
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Muscle Up ---> 10 Straight Bar Dips ---> 10 Pull Ups
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Muscle Up ---> 5 Straight Bar Dips ---> 5 Pull Ups
x3-4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Muscle Ups (b) ---> 5 Muscle Ups (p)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Russian Dips with 10kg ---> 10 Dips
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 90kg Squats
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20x 50kg Squats ---> 15x 40kg Lunges (E/S)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Reps on any Calf Exercises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
8 Front Lever Raises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Dragon Flag
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
2 Muscle Ups ---> 10 Straight Bar Dips ---> 10 Pull Ups
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 20kg Pull Ups ---> 10x 20kg Dips
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
4x 20kg Pull Ups ---> 4x 20kg Dips ---> 4x 20kg Chin Ups ---> 10x 20kg Push Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
2 Dragon Flags
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Front Lever Raises
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 20kg Back Extensions
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 Back Extensions ---> 1 min Hollow Hold with 10kg
x3 Sets (2 min rest inbetween sets)
20 Pull Ups ---> 20 Dips ---> 20 Chin Ups ---> 20 Push Ups
x2 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups ---> 15 Ring Push Ups
x3-4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max L-Sit Hold ---> 5 Toes to Bar
x5-7 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Intermediate Program Level 2 - Week 2
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Only Progress to Week 3 if you can achieve 2 Muscle Ups in a row with clean form.
